roleset.name: move
roleset.note: SWAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sway' based on sentences in wsj. Framenet entry Suasion2. VN classes body_internal_motion-49 and modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3. (from sway.01-v)

example.name: normally intransitive
example.text: Suddenly the woman begins swaying and then writhing.

example.name: occasionally with EXT
example.text: Staffers at Thompson, whose offices are in the ultramodern Embarcadero Center, watched pictures drop from the walls and then felt the skyscraper sway seven to eight feet, according to a spokeswoman.

roleset.name: persuade (per-sway-d?)
roleset.note: SWAY-V NOTES: Never in active? VN class urge-58.1. (from sway.02-v)

example.name: cause to change mind
example.text: As a result, [many of those now planning to leave Hong Kong]-1 can't easily be swayed *trace*-1 by momentary improvements in the colony's political and economic climate.
example.arg: by momentary improvements in the colony's political and economic climate
